about_the_game: The official and complete sound track for Super Slam Dunk Touchdown released exclusively on Steam. This version contains all the tunes from Creator Rick Felice as well as Gabe Castro's amazing work and "Friday Night", written by Pierre Dupree and composed as a chiptune by Gabe Castro. Also includes bonus interlude, "OH NO!"
detailed_description: The official and complete sound track for Super Slam Dunk Touchdown released exclusively on Steam. This version contains all the tunes from Creator Rick Felice as well as Gabe Castro's amazing work and "Friday Night", written by Pierre Dupree and composed as a chiptune by Gabe Castro. Also includes bonus interlude, "OH NO!"
